text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunshine
Felt like the first time
Heart beats in a straight line
Morning whispers so kind

[Verse 2]
Birds singin' in the trees
Gentle summer breeze
Chasin' all the worries
Feeling light and so free

[Chorus]
Sunrise in my eyes
Coloring the skies
Dreams come alive
And I'm ready to fly

[Verse 3]
Steppin' out the door
Life's got much in store
Every step I'm sure
Wantin' more and more

[Verse 4]
Clouds just driftin' by
In the bright blue sky
Can you hear my sigh
It's a peaceful high

[Chorus]
Sunrise in my eyes
Coloring the skies
Dreams come alive
And I'm ready to fly
title: Sunrise Dream
